Introduction

Shannon Arrum Williams-Lees, also known as Shannon Williams or Shannon, is a Welsh-Korean content creator and former singer. She made her official debut in December 2014 with the single "Daybreak Rain." She recently stepped away from Kpop after leaving her former agency MBK Entertainment. She officially left K-pop in 2021.
